mapper.select: SELECT E.NO , P.NAME POS_NO , D.NAME DEPT_NO , E.ID , E.NAME , E.ENROLL_DATE , E.RESIGN_YN FROM EMPLOYEE E, POSITION P, DEPARTMENT D WHERE E.POS_NO = P.NO AND E.DEPT_NO = D.NO ORDER BY E.NO DESC
SELECT NO , CORPORATE , TEL , FAX , PNAME , EMAIL , DELETE_YN FROM ACCOUNT WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY NO DESC
SELECT NO , DEPT_NO , POS_NO , NAME , EMAIL , PHONE FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE NO = #{no}
SELECT NO , CORPORATE , ADDRESS , TEL , FAX , PNAME , DEPT , POSITION , PHONE , EMAIL FROM ACCOUNT WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND NO = #{no}
